description: Teleport your General to a space behind an enemy.

name: Corporeal Cadence
description: Destroy a friendly minion to deal its Attack to the enemy General.

name: Vale Ascension
description: Summon a friendly non-token minion destroyed this game onto friendly Hallowed Ground.

name: Azure Summoning
description: Whenever you summon a minion with Flying from your action bar this turn, draw a minion with Flying from your deck.

name: Fortified Assault
description: Turn an enemy minion's space into Hallowed Ground. Deal it 1 damage for each friendly Hallowed Ground.

name: Vaath's Brutality
description: Stun an enemy minion. Give your General +1 Attack.

name: Vespyrian Might
description: Give a Vespyr minion +2/+2 for each friendly Vespyr.

name: Firestorm Mantra
description: Steal Health from the enemy General equal to twice the number of spells cast this turn.

name: Endure the Beastlands
description: Turn a 2x2 area into Primal Flourish.

name: Evolutionary Apex
description: BOTH players put all minions in their action bars onto the battlefield nearby their General.

name: Flawless Reflection
description: Choose a minion. Transform ALL nearby minions into copies of it.

name: Spiral Counter
description: Deal 8 damage to an enemy minion that attacked last turn.

name: Icebreak Ambush
description: Summon an ambush of Infiltrate minions on your opponent's starting side of the battlefield.

name: Verdant Fulmination
description: Your minions on friendly Primal Flourish grow. Turn your other minions' spaces into Primal Flourish.

name: Blood Rage
description: Give a friendly minion +1/+1 for each time damage was dealt this turn.

name: Blinding Snowstorm
description: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Those enemies can only move 1 space next turn.

name: Superior Mirage
description: Summon three copies of an enemy minion nearby it. They disappear when attacked.

name: Droplift
description: Steal a random artifact from the enemy General and equip it.

name: Skywind Glaives
description: Friendly minions nearby your General gain +2 Attack.

name: Soul Grimwar
description: Your General gains, "Deathwatch: Gains +2 Attack."

name: Sunstone Bracers
description: Your General gains +1 Attack.

name: Horn of the Forsaken
description: Whenever your General deals damage, summon a 1/1 Wraithling nearby your General.

name: Staff Of Y'Kir
description: Your General gains +2 Attack.

name: Mask of Shadows
description: Your General gains Backstab (4).

name: Wildfire Ankh
description: Your General gains Blast.

name: Cyclone Mask
description: Your General gains Ranged.

name: Bloodrage Mask
description: Whenever you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to the enemy General.

name: Hexblade
description: Your General gains +3 Attack. Whenever your General damages an enemy minion, its Attack becomes 1.

name: Adamantite Claws
description: Your General gains +4 Attack.

name: Iridium Scale
description: Your General gains Frenzy.

name: Spectral Blade
description: Your General gains +2 Attack. Whenever your General destroys an enemy minion, restore 2 Health to your General.

name: Snowpiercer
description: Your General gains +3 Attack.

name: Coldbiter
description: At the end of your turn, your General deals 2 damage to each enemy minion around them.

name: Twin Fang
description: Whenever a friendly minion or your General takes damage, your General gains +2 Attack.

name: Arclyte Regalia
description: Your General gains +2 Attack. The first time your General takes damage each turn, prevent 2 of it.

name: Winterblade
description: Your General gains +2 Attack. Enemy minions damaged by your General are Stunned.

name: Ghost Azalea
description: Your General gains +1 Attack for each friendly Shadow Creep.

name: White Asp
description: Your General gains +3 Attack. Whenever your General destroys a minion, summon a 3/3 Blazing Spine Wall on that space.

name: Spinecleaver
description: Your General gains +1 Attack. Enemy minions destroyed by your General summon a Bloodfire Totem on that space.

name: Crescent Spear
description: Your General gains +1 Attack. Spells you cast that deal damage deal +1 damage.

name: Dawn's Eye
description: Your General gains +4 Attack. At the end of your turn, repair all of your artifacts to full durability.

name: Morin-Khur
description: Your General gains +3 Attack. Whenever your General deals damage, hatch all friendly Eggs.

name: Gold Vitriol
description: Whenever anything is healed, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.

name: Bangle of Blinding Strike
description: Your General has Celerity.

name: Godhammer
description: Your minions have "Grow: +1/+1."

name: Thunderclap
description: When your General destroys a minion, summon a copy of it nearby.

name: The Releaser
description: When this artifact breaks, summon a random friendly non-token minion destroyed this game nearby.

name: Iceshatter Gauntlet
description: Whenever your General attacks a stunned minion, destroy it instantly.

name: Halo Bulwark
description: Friendly minions nearby your General have Forcefield.

name: Unbounded Energy Amulet
description:
Your General gains +1 Attack.
Your General may move an additional space.

name: Mindlathe
description: After your General damages a minion, reactivate and take control of it until the end of your turn.

name: The Dredger
description: Whenever your General damages an enemy, randomly teleport them to your starting side of the battlefield.

name: Oblivion Sickle
description: Whenever your General destroys an enemy, turn that space into Exhuming Sand.

name: Eternal Heart
description: Your General cannot die.

name: Mana Spring
description: Gain +1 Mana this turn.

name: Shadow Creep Tile
description: Deals damage to enemy minions and Generals standing on it at the end of owner's turn.

name: Hallowed Ground
description: Restores 1 Health to friendly minions and Generals standing on it at the end of owner's turn.

name: Exhuming Sand
description: Summons a 2/2 Iron Dervish when its owner summons a minion from their action bar.

name: Primal Flourish
description: Friendly minions standing on it have "Grow: +2/+2".
